query.statement: SELECT V.PARITY_YM, V.CUSTCD, V.CUSTCDNM, ROUND(DECODE(MAX(V.COST_PER_CNT), 0, 0, SUM(GUBUN1)/MAX(COST_PER_CNT))) GUBUN1, ROUND(DECODE(MAX(V.COST_PER_CNT), 0, 0, SUM(GUBUN2)/MAX(COST_PER_CNT))) GUBUN2, ROUND(DECODE(MAX(V.COST_PER_CNT), 0, 0, SUM(GUBUN3)/MAX(COST_PER_CNT))) GUBUN3, ROUND(DECODE(MAX(V.COST_PER_CNT), 0, 0, SUM(GUBUN4)/MAX(COST_PER_CNT))) GUBUN4, ROUND(DECODE(MAX(V.COST_PER_CNT), 0, 0, SUM(GUBUN1)/MAX(COST_PER_CNT))) + ROUND(DECODE(MAX(V.COST_PER_CNT), 0, 0, SUM(GUBUN2)/MAX(COST_PER_CNT))) + ROUND(DECODE(MAX(V.COST_PER_CNT), 0, 0, SUM(GUBUN3)/MAX(COST_PER_CNT))) + ROUND(DECODE(MAX(V.COST_PER_CNT), 0, 0, SUM(GUBUN4)/MAX(COST_PER_CNT))) TOTOL_SUM, '' UPJANGNM, 'X' APPROV_CONGUBN FROM ( SELECT V.SEQ_ID, V.PARITY_YM, V.UPJANG, (SELECT UPJANGNM FROM SCO_UPJANG_MST_V WHERE UPJANG = V.UPJANG) UPJANGNM, V.CUSTCD, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'MA1006' AND CODE = V.CUSTCD) CUSTCDNM, V.PARITY_GUBUN, V.COMMENTS, (SELECT SUM(DECODE(B.SCORE, 1, A.ATTR1_SCORE, 2, A.ATTR2_SCORE, 3, A.ATTR3_SCORE, 4, A.ATTR4_SCORE, 5, A.ATTR5_SCORE, 0)) FROM MAS_CORNER_PARITY A, MAS_CORNER_PARITY_DTL B WHERE (A.SEQ_ID = B.ATTR) AND (A.ATTR03 = '배송') AND (B.SEQ_ID = V.SEQ_ID)) GUBUN1, (SELECT SUM(DECODE(B.SCORE, 1, A.ATTR1_SCORE, 2, A.ATTR2_SCORE, 3, A.ATTR3_SCORE, 4, A.ATTR4_SCORE, 5, A.ATTR5_SCORE, 0)) FROM MAS_CORNER_PARITY A, MAS_CORNER_PARITY_DTL B WHERE (A.SEQ_ID = B.ATTR) AND (A.ATTR03 = '검수/검품') AND (B.SEQ_ID = V.SEQ_ID)) GUBUN2, (SELECT SUM(DECODE(B.SCORE, 1, A.ATTR1_SCORE, 2, A.ATTR2_SCORE, 3, A.ATTR3_SCORE, 4, A.ATTR4_SCORE, 5, A.ATTR5_SCORE, 0)) FROM MAS_CORNER_PARITY A, MAS_CORNER_PARITY_DTL B WHERE (A.SEQ_ID = B.ATTR) AND (A.ATTR03 = '반품협조') AND (B.SEQ_ID = V.SEQ_ID)) GUBUN3, (SELECT SUM(DECODE(B.SCORE, 1, A.ATTR1_SCORE, 2, A.ATTR2_SCORE, 3, A.ATTR3_SCORE, 4, A.ATTR4_SCORE, 5, A.ATTR5_SCORE, 0)) FROM MAS_CORNER_PARITY A, MAS_CORNER_PARITY_DTL B WHERE (A.SEQ_ID = B.ATTR) AND (A.ATTR03 = '기타') AND (B.SEQ_ID = V.SEQ_ID)) GUBUN4, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAS_CORNER_PARITY_MST WHERE (PARITY_YM = #PARITY_YM#) AND (CUSTCD = V.CUSTCD)) COST_PER_CNT FROM MAS_CORNER_PARITY_MST V WHERE (V.PARITY_YM = #PARITY_YM#) ) V GROUP BY V.PARITY_YM, V.CUSTCD, V.CUSTCDNM
